message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $180 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me there?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  $90 is quite a bit lower than I'm hoping for. Could you do $150?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I know it's a bit lower than my previous offer, but I'm really looking to save some money. Can you meet me at $80?
